prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Should I hold on to hope that Stefan will express romantic feelings for me in the next month, or hang up and move on?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a list of all relevant horary chart data using traditional horary principles for your query. In this reading, you (Melissa) are represented by your Ascendant, and Stefan is represented by the 9th house—that is, by your chart’s 6th house (cusp at 5° Sagittarius). All planetary positions, aspects, patterns, and special features are noted as follows:

──────────────────────────────
1. House Cusps and Indicators

• Melissa’s Ascendant (Self): 8° Cancer (1st House; contains Mars in Cancer).
• Stefan’s indicator (9th House by his measure): Corresponds to your 6th House, which begins at 5° Sagittarius. (No planet is placed in the 6th house.)

──────────────────────────────
2. Planetary Positions (with Signs, Degrees, and Inferred House Placement)

• Sun: 15° 13′ Aquarius – located in your 8th House (which begins at 0° Aquarius).
• Moon: 25° 20′ Aries – located in your 11th House (starts at 21° Aries).
• Mercury: 11° 7′ Aquarius – located in your 8th House.
• Venus: 29° 37′ Pisces – located in your 10th House (starts at 14° Pisces).
• Mars (r): 19° 40′ Cancer – located in your 1st House.
• Jupiter (r): 11° 16′ Gemini – located in your 12th House (starts at 5° Gemini).
• Saturn: 17° 43′ Pisces – located in your 10th House.
• Uranus: 23° 16′ Taurus – located in your 11th House? (Given 11th begins at 21° Aries, note that Uranus in Taurus falls in the area of a house change depending on whole sign vs. Placidus; for these purposes, note its stated position.)
• Neptune: 28° 3′ Pisces – located in your 10th House.
• Pluto: 2° 8′ Aquarius – located in your 8th House.
• North Node (r): 29° 42′ Pisces – located in your 10th House.
• Chiron: 19° 35′ Aries – located in your 10th House.

──────────────────────────────
3. Major Aspects (Orb values noted)

• Mars square Chiron (orb 0°)
• MC (Midheaven at 14° Pisces) opposite IC (Nadir at 14° Virgo) (orb 0°)
• Venus conjunct North Node (orb 0°)
• Mercury trine Jupiter (orb 0°)
• Neptune conjunct North Node (orb 1°)
• Venus conjunct Neptune (orb 1°)
• Mars trine Saturn (orb 2°)
• Pluto sextile North Node (orb 3°)
• Venus sextile Pluto (orb 3°)
• Jupiter square IC (orb 3°)
• Jupiter square MC (orb 3°)
• Saturn opposite IC (orb 3°)
• Saturn conjunct MC (orb 3°)
• Mars sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
• Sun sextile Chiron (orb 4°)
• Sun conjunct Mercury (orb 4°)
• Sun trine Jupiter (orb 4°)
• Uranus sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
• Mars sextile IC (orb 5°)
• Mars trine MC (orb 5°)
• Ascendant sextile IC (orb 6°)
• Saturn sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
• Venus sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
• Jupiter square Saturn (orb 6°)
• Moon square Mars (orb 6°)
• Moon conjunct Chiron (orb 6°)
• Ascendant trine MC (orb 6°)
• Moon square Pluto (orb 7°)

──────────────────────────────
4. Patterns in the Chart

• T-Square: Involving MC (14° Pisces), Jupiter (11° Gemini), IC (14° Virgo) with Saturn (17° Pisces) as part of the configuration.
• Yod: Formed by Mercury (11° Aquarius), the IC (14° Virgo), and the Ascendant (8° Cancer).
• Cradle: Involving Saturn (17° Pisces), the IC (14° Virgo), Mars (19° Cancer), and Uranus (23° Taurus).

──────────────────────────────
5. Special Features & Additional Data

• The Moon was a waxing crescent.
• The chart exhibits a Bowl shape.
• There is a dominant Water element among the inner planets.
• None of the inner planets fall in an Earth sign.
• There is an even distribution of the three modes (Cardinal, Mutable, Fixed) among the inner planets.
• The bottom right quadrant of the chart is empty.
• The majority of the planets are situated in the upper right quadrant.
• Saturn is positioned on the Midheaven, while the IC is on the Nadir.
• The Sextile aspect is the most frequent (total of 9 occurrences).
• The Moon has 12 total aspects.
• The Moon in Aries and Mars in Cancer stand in mutual reception.
• Neptune in Pisces sits in its rulership.

──────────────────────────────
This listing contains all the objective horary data taken directly from your chart. Each element may prove significant when interpreting your query: whether to hold onto hope for Stefan’s romantic expression or move on. Further interpretation will consider how these indicators interact, especially those relating to your Ascendant and Stefan’s indicator (your 6th House).

Please confirm if you wish to proceed to the next step of analysis based on these findings.

──────────────────────────────

Each element may prove significant when interpreting your query: whether to hold onto hope for Stefan’s romantic expression or move on. Please confirm if you wish to proceed to the next step of analysis based on these findings.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Analysis based on your horary chart data indicates the following:

1. Your Ascendant in Cancer—with Mars residing in Cancer—reveals strong personal passion and emotional investment. Yet Mars square Chiron warns of a personal wound that may be exacerbated if you cling too long to an unrequited hope.

2. Stefan’s representation by your 6th house (as the proxy for his 9th house connection) remains largely unactivated. The absence of significant planetary involvement in your 6th house suggests that there is little dynamic energy pushing Stefan to act in a romantic manner during the forthcoming month.

3. Key aspects such as Mercury trine Jupiter, which points to communication and possibly encouraging news, are somewhat tempered by the heavy concentration of activity in your 10th house. With Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron situated there, the emphasis falls on responsibilities, reputations, and idealizations rather than free, spontaneous emotional expression.

4. Venus conjunct Neptune and Venus conjunct North Node in the 10th house indicate a tendency to view romantic prospects through an idealized lens. While these suggest a destined elegance in relationships, they may also create illusions. This further supports a scenario in which your hopes could be tied up in fantasies rather than grounded realities.

5. The Yod pattern (involving Mercury, IC, and your Ascendant) emphasizes a fated need to refine your approach through personal insight. This formation implies that there is an inherent transformation required if you pursue this matter, though it does not guarantee the outcome you desire.

6. The T-square involving the MC, Jupiter, and IC (with Saturn on your MC) reflects tension between your public and private worlds. This conflict typically signals delays or obstacles in clear, decisive romantic communication from the other party.

7. Taken together, the lack of strong indicators on Stefan’s side (via the 6th house) and the several cautions present in your personal indicators suggest that the energy is not aligned for Stefan to declare romantic feelings soon. The structured, serious energy predominating in your 10th house and the overall chart configuration imply that this is not a favorable time for a spontaneous or heartfelt romantic expression from him.

Based on these specific elements in your chart—the inactive nature of Stefan’s house, the delicate balance of communication aspects, and the weighty influence of idealistic yet cautious energies—the indication is that holding on to hope for a near-term declaration from Stefan carries high risk of deepening emotional wounds.

The honest and data-driven interpretation, then, leans toward advising you to consider moving on rather than awaiting a romantic expression that the chart does not robustly support at this moment.
